text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Coerce" means to compel or attempt to compel another by threat of harm or other adverse consequences.

"Criminal gang" means a group or association of three or more persons whose members:
individually or collectively engage in a pattern of criminal gang activity;
have as one of their primary objectives or activities the commission of one or more underlying crimes, including acts by juveniles that would be underlying crimes if committed by adults; and
have in common an overt or covert organizational or command structure.

"Pattern of criminal gang activity" means the commission of, attempted commission of, conspiracy to commit, or solicitation of two or more underlying crimes or acts by a juvenile that would be an underlying crime if committed by an adult, provided the crimes or acts were not part of the same incident.
"Solicit" has the meaning stated in § 11-301 of this article.
